recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a large pan, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic, cook until softened.
Add ground beef, cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti and garnish with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill or pan-fry the chicken breast until fully cooked, then slice it.
Chop the romaine lettuce and place it in a large bowl.
Add sliced chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad and toss to combine.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread to your desired crispiness.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado over the toast.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle red pepper flakes on top.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and sugar.
Add milk and egg, then whisk until smooth.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and add a small amount of butter.
Pour batter onto the skillet and cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook the other side until golden brown.
Serve warm with syrup or your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place a slice of cheese between two bread slices with buttered sides facing out.
Heat a skillet over medium heat and cook the sandwich until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.name: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Pour eggs into the skillet and cook until set, then add cheese and ham.
Fold the omelette and serve warm.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugars together, then add egg and vanilla.
Mix in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden brown.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.
Arrange on a plate, alternating between tomato and mozzarella slices.
Sprinkle basil leaves, drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning until browned.
Place beef in tortillas and top with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and sour cream.

recipes.name: Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend banana, berries, and yogurt until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with honey, granola, and chia seeds.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 1 minute.
Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for an additional 2 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Classic French Toast
instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, and cinnamon in a bowl.
Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat and cook bread until golden on both sides.
Serve with maple syrup.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Heat olive oil and butter in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3-4 minutes.
Pour in lemon juice and sprinkle with parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef cubes in a large pot.
Add onion, carrot, and potato and cook until softened.
Pour in beef broth and thyme, then simmer for 1-2 hours until beef is tender.

recipes.name: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Scramble eggs in a pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add cooked rice, peas, and carrots.
Stir in soy sauce and scrambled eggs, then garnish with green onions.

recipes.name: Macaroni and Cheese
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package directions.
In a saucepan, melt butter and whisk in flour.
Gradually add milk and cheese, stirring until smooth.
Mix cheese sauce with macaroni and serve warm.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion.
Combine with olives and feta cheese in a bowl.
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle oregano before serving.

recipes.name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Melt butter in a skillet and add minced garlic.
Add shrimp and cook until pink, about 3 minutes.
Stir in lemon juice and sprinkle with parsley before serving.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook sliced chicken until browned.
Add butter, garlic, cream, and Parmesan to make the sauce.
Mix sauce with fettuccine and top with chicken before serving.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa
instructions: Dice mango, red onion, and bell pepper.
Mix in a bowl with cilantro, lime juice, and salt.
Serve as a topping or dip.
